name: Valorous Asteroids
description:
blast your way through an asteroid field. the smallest asteroids are energy for your ship so you must keep moving .there are more bonuses and hazards along the way. 

keys:

space/left click - fire

ctrl/right click - Hyperdrive 

m - Mouse Aiming on/off

p - pause/highscore

esc - end game

F3 - Fullscreen

F4 - Window

F10 exit game
